name: The Hot Candied Sweet Potatoes
steps: Cut sweet potatoes into uniform-sized hob blocks.
Fry sweet patatoes with peanut oil to golden brown.
Melt suger with peanut oil.
Mix melted suger with fried sweet patatos.

name: Braised Intestines in Brown Sauce
steps: Clean entirely the pig intestine.
nest smaller intestine with biger one to three or more layers.
Boil nested intestine with hot water.
Cut boiled intestine into blocks
Fry cutted intestine with suger, ginger, cinnamon, white pepper.

name: Kung Pao chicken
steps: Cut chichen breasts into small pieces.
Marinate sliced chicken breasts with wine, oil, white pepper and salt for 10 minutes.
Fry marinated chicken until chicken turn to white.
Put dry hot pepper and onion into chicken for fry.
Mix fried chicken with peanuts.

name: Mapo Tofu
steps: Slice tofu into small pieces.
Soap sliced tofu into water with some salt for 15 minutes.
Fry ground beef with oil and pixian douban untill fully cooked.
Put tofu into pot mix with fried beef and other seasons.

name: White Cut Chicken
steps: Clear entirely whole chicken.
Boil chicken with cold water and ginger.
Turn off fire 2 minutes after the water start to boil.
Waite for half hour then get out the whole chicken.
Brush sesame oil on cold chicken.

name: Roast Goose
steps: Clan entirely whole goose.
Mix suger, salt, pepper, MSG, giner powder, licorice powder, seafood sauce, sesame paste, fuel consumption and soybean sauce to make roast goose sauce.
Brush roash goose sauce onto cleaned goose.
Roast marinated goose with 390 F for 45 minutes.

name: Stinky Mandarin Fish
steps: Fry marinated squid both sides.
Fry groud pork, bamboo shots, groud ginger and groud garlic.
Mix fish with pork, bamboo and wine, soybean sauce.

name: Wenzhen Bamboo Shoots
steps: Slice bamboo shoots to blocks.
Boil bamboo shots with ham for 20 minutes.
Put shiitake mushroom into the pot and boil for 5 minutes.

name: Brine shrimp
steps: Clean shrimp, remove the shrimp line.
Boil shrimp using hot water with ginger.
Server cooked shrimp with vineger and soybean sauce.

name: Fu Zhou Fish Ball
steps: Mix fish stuffing with salt, water, sweet patatoes powder and fish sauce.
Make the fillings using pork stuffing, soybean sauce and suger.
Make the fish ball using fish stuffing with fillings inside.
Boil the fish bass with hot water untill full cooked.

name: Yanchen Qiao Ball
steps: Groud pork belly to stuffing.
Mix pork stuffing with egg, starch, pepper powder, salt and ginger garlic.
Make big balls with the mix stuffing.
Fry the balls to fully cooked.
Make special sauce using oil, water and Teriyaki sauce.
Put special onto cooked meat ball.

name: Three Layer Ducks
steps: Clean entirely ducks and pigeon.
Remove the bones of ducks and pigon.
Put pigeon inside wild duck together mushroom and ham slices.
Put the wild duck into duck.
Boil the duck using hot water with ginger, mushroom, ham and bamboo shoots slices.

name: Chop Bell Pepper Fish Head
steps: Marinate fish head with pepper, oil, salt for 10 minutes.
Steam marinated fish head with chopped bell pepper for 2 minutes.
Pour boiled oil on steamed fish head.

name: Fried Pork with Chilli
steps: Boil pork belly for 5 minutes.
Slice cooked pork belly to slices.
Fry pork slices with hot pepper, garlic and soybean.

name: Shelled Fresh Shrimps Cooked with Longjing Tea
steps: Make tea using longjing tea, keep the tea leaves.
Clean the shrimp, remove crust.
Fry shrimp untill cooked.
Fry shrimp with tea leaves.

name: Fish Cooked in Vinegar Gravy
steps: Clean entirely the grass carp.
Boil carp with ginger and wine.
Use another pot to fry ginger, wine and vineger wit oil to make special sauce.
Pour special sauce onto boiled fish.
